name: Kingdom of Exalis
description:
Kingdom of Exalis is Basically A Continuance to M is Lost(Ending 4), Instead of Iris Greeting Mario to Save Luigi, Mario Head's to Exalis, But this Story Does Not Focus On Mario Only, But 5 Other Characters

Cast: Aska, Jonathan, Arthur, Ludacris And Derris

Credits:

Chilly Tiutti For Mario Faceset

Yanfly And TSR For Plugins

Note: There is A Typo At the Mario Event in Episode 1, Didn't Notice it When Publishing Because I Was Focused On Finishing the First Chapter, It's Supposed to Say "Exalis Isn't A Place for Vacations" Not "Exalis a place For Vacations"
